tool_description: Enriches raw product data by cleaning text fields, standardizing formats, extracting additional attributes, and preparing data for classification.

product_ids.description: Array of product identifiers to enrich

text_cleaning.description: Whether to apply text cleaning and normalization

extract_brand.description: Whether to attempt brand name extraction

extract_color.description: Whether to attempt color extraction from descriptions

extract_size.description: Whether to attempt size information extraction

language_detection.description: Whether to detect and standardize language of text fields

error_messages: Empty product list: At least one product ID must be provided for enrichment
Enrichment failed: Unable to process the specified products
Invalid product data: Some products have corrupted or inaccessible data
usage: Provide product_ids and configure enrichment options. The tool processes and enhances product data quality for better classification results.

brands_extracted.description: Number of products with extracted brand information

colors_extracted.description: Number of products with extracted color information

sizes_extracted.description: Number of products with extracted size information

text_fields_cleaned.description: Number of text fields that were cleaned
